titleInfo.title: Interview and Performance - Memories of Buck,Bonnie Owens and Merle Haggard - 2012-11-10

mods.abstract: Memories of Buck Owens; Bonnie Owens and Merle Haggard; Interview and performances with Buddy Alan Owens; Michael Owens; John Owens; Mel Owens from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 10, 2012. Companion to a Bakersfield Music exhibit.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
